explanation: [0-0] A street at night. Three characters are sitting on a bench in front of a house. Mario is wearing a hat with fox ears, a red shirt, and blue overalls. The girl on the left is wearing a pink dress and a yellow crown. Cat Luigi is wearing a cat costume and turns his head to look to the left.

[0-6] Then Mario opens his mouth wide and yells. The camera turns to Princess Peach, who has long blonde hair and wears a grey kimono with a floral pattern, throwing a sake bottle at Mario. Mario falls backward from the bench.
